summary: This module contains a suite of automated tests that verify image generation functionality across multiple AI providers (Azure OpenAI DALL·E 3, OpenAI DALL·E 3, Amazon Bedrock Stable Diffusion variants, and Google Vertex AI). It defines helper classes that bundle default request parameters for each service and includes test cases that invoke the litellm image generation API with those parameters, checking for correct handling of optional arguments and response structures.
business_intent: Validate and maintain the correctness of multi‑provider image generation integrations, ensuring that default configurations and optional parameters work as expected in continuous integration pipelines.
